title: Interpretation of a dream about a well

preview.html: We find that seeing a well in a dream has many different meanings. Many people feel fear and dread when seeing a well because of its darkness and depth, but seeing a well in a dream can be good if it contains water. According to the shape of the well, the following is the detailed interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the well in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream by Ibn Sirin There are many interpretations of seeing a well in a dream by Ibn Sirin, because it has many different meanings, including: Ibn Sirin says that seeing a well in a dream can It means that the dreamer will be blessed with money, knowledge, or marriage. When you see a well in a dream, it can indicate falling into its wake or the presence of deception or deception, and this is due to the details of the vision. When the dreamer sees the presence of water in the well, it indicates to the man that he will provide you with a wife. If she is a good woman, then he will be blessed with a good husband. Also, seeing a well in a dream indicates the presence of distress, such as what was mentioned in the Qur’an about the story of our master Joseph, peace be upon him, who was thrown into the well by his brothers. Seeing a well in a dream indicates the owner of the house that his The well water will be his money and source of livelihood, and it may also indicate to the wife if the water well sees that she has money. Or a fetus. Interpretation of seeing falling into a well: Seeing falling into a well, if the well contains pure water, may indicate that the dreamer’s work is for a righteous man from whom salvation will come. However, if he sees that he fell into the well and its water is cloudy, this means that he wronged a man. Another. If he is seen sitting in the well without falling into it, this interprets that the fortuneteller is dealing with another corrupt and evil person, a man who has escaped his evil. Also, if the dreamer sees that his feet are submerged in the well, this indicates that all or part of his money is lost. Through fraud. Falling into a well in a dream may indicate that one’s opinion will fall in the ranks and may also lead to the loss of the glory and prestige that one enjoys. Whoever sees that he fell into a well and it dries up, it indicates in him a doctrine or treachery that he may be exposed to, and that Of the people closest to him, whether betrayed by a relative or betrayed by a friend. When the dreamer sees that he is drowning in a well, this indicates that he will be betrayed because of his greed, as he may be a victim of his greed. When the dreamer sees that he is pushing others into the well, this indicates that he is betraying a friend Or a brother to achieve his interests or ultimately fulfill his desires. And whoever sees himself pushing his son into the well, this indicates that he is forcing his son to do what he does not like, or commanding him to do what will anger God Almighty. And whoever dreams that he threw into the well some of the things that he had, this indicates However, he is hiding something within himself that may be a secret that no one knows about except God Almighty. In conclusion, we may have provided all the explanations and clues for seeing the well in a dream, because it is one of the most frightening things in the souls of many, and they need a lot of explanation and knowledge of the clues. behind that. their lives.

title: Interpretation of a dream about shaving a man’s beard for a single woman

preview.html: In our article today from gptafser.com/, we will show you all the symbols of this vision for men and women. Interpretation of seeing shaving your beard in a dream for a single girl: Seeing himself shaving his beard in a dream for an unmarried girl alone in a dream. A good vision indicates that she is approaching entering a new period in her life that may It portends an engagement or marriage to a rich man, and God knows best. An unmarried girl who sees herself shaving her father’s beard in a dream, and collecting the scattered hair in her lap in a dream. A vision that shows that she is loyal to her father and loves him very much, and will receive a large inheritance from him after his death, and God knows best. As for If an unmarried girl sees that the groom is approaching her without a beard, but in fact he has a beard. This vision indicates that he is a hypocrite and a liar, and he must wait until he makes a decision, and God knows best. Seeing a man shaving in a dream for an unmarried girl and she does not know him in the dream. The dream symbolizes that she will She will marry someone she did not know before, but she will be happy with him, and God knows best. Seeing a girl’s beard shaving in a dream and it was thick is a sign of getting rid of the worries she feels in her life. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of shaving your beard in a dream. Interpretation of seeing shaving your beard in a dream For a married woman. A married woman sees herself shaving her husband’s beard in a dream and he was happy with it. It is a metaphor for being a good wife, helping her husband, standing by his side in his work, resolving his crises, and loving and appreciating her deeply, and God knows best. And a married woman seeing that her son has grown up and has a beard and mustache in a dream. An indication that her son will succeed in life and occupy a high position among his peers, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman shaving her beard for herself in a dream is good news for getting rid of crises, especially financial ones. As for a married woman whose husband is suffering from debts and they are increasing in debt, he shaves his beard in a dream. She explains that it is Which pays off his debts, and God knows best. Seeing a man’s beard growing and a married woman asking him to shave it in a dream. She remembers that there are many problems between them and him, and she asks him to help her solve them, and God knows best. A married woman shaves her husband’s long and thick beard in a dream. It is a metaphor for him standing still. By his side in a major crisis related to his work, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing shaving a beard in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a person sees in a dream that his beard is thick and long, it is a metaphor for reproduction and abundance of livelihood, and God knows best. It also indicates that he seeks to gain knowledge and acquire information, and is learning highly educated. And God knows best. A man who sees himself shaving his beard in a dream is a sign of a problem in his life, and God knows best. And when a man sees himself shaving his beard and admires it in a dream after shaving. This means that he has made an important decision in his life and he is satisfied with it. Seeing a man shaving his beard Thick in a dream. A sign of quickly getting rid of worries and sadness, and God knows best. A man sees his wife shaving his beard in a dream and it causes him pain and injury in the dream. The vision symbolizes separation and the emergence of divorce, and God knows best. But when a man sees his wife shaving his beard, he freezes in the dream. An indication of... The stability of his life with her and his love

title: Learn about the interpretation of beef in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Beef in a dream: Among the visions, there are multiple interpretations and interpretations, due to the diversity of the condition of the meat itself from one vision to another, as well as the difference in the state of the insight, and in some cases it is interpreted as a sign of good things to come and in other cases it portends the appearance of unpleasant things, so we will know the most accurate interpretations. According to the opinions of interpretation scholars. Just follow along with us. Beef in a dream by Ibn Sirinma. Interpretation of seeing beef in a dream? Seeing beef in a dream is interpreted as one of the dreams that implies that the dreamer is going through many life problems and obstacles that get in the way, whether in scientific or practical life. Seeing the dreamer eating uncooked beef surrounded by blood is considered an unfavorable vision that brings many health problems to the dreamer and is a sign that he is exposed to serious diseases, so he needs to maintain his health. Avoid falling into this crisis. If the beef in the dream was cooked but its taste was unpleasant, this indicates the occurrence of family problems and disputes, or the visionary being exposed to major financial losses. On the other hand, cooked beef, with a good taste and smell, is evidence of... The imminent trick, to get rid of a difficult period of life cluttered with multiple problems and the beginning of a new phase dominated by success and joy. Beef in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that beef in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to many problems, as beef is one of the foods that It takes a long time to digest, and this period is a sign of fatigue and suffering. The dreamer is going through his life. Seeing grilled beef in a dream means the beginning of a stage of stability and security, because the dreamer was able to get rid of the problems and disturbances that were occupying him before. Seeing beef being cooked over a fire in a dream also explains that the dreamer is taking an illegal path to gain income. Forbidden money and he must desist from this sin. Beef in a dream is interpreted as a sign of limited livelihood and exposure to financial losses, as well as the passage of the fortuneteller or one of his family members during a period of deteriorating health and possibly undergoing critical surgical operations. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a group of The best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. Beef in a dream for a single woman Seeing beef in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign for her that many changes will occur in her life and she often moves from one place to another, either in daily life or within the scope of work. , making her feel uneasy and uncomfortable. Constantly stressed. Whereas, if a single woman sees that she is eating beef and is very happy because of its wonderful taste, this is a sign that she will be able to achieve the goals she dreams of or get involved with someone she loves and she will be like that. Very happy with. If a girl cooks beef, it is interpreted that she will marry a man whose financial condition is good, but he will cause deterioration.

title: Interpretation of a woman seeing myself in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing oneself in a dream. It has been mentioned in many sayings of scholars according to Ibn Sirin that the woman in all dreams symbolizes the power of the world in the heart of the dreamer. Seeing a woman holding myself in a dream is a warning sign. Notifying the dreamer that he is coming to commit sin and immorality, or that he is already in the act. Seeing a woman who wants For herself, without any desire to obey him and not submitting to this temptation is the dreamer’s fear and unwillingness to commit sin in his real life. It also indicates signs that indicate the badness that characterizes the fortuneteller in his real life, such as lying, emotions, and other prohibitions. It is an indication that the fortuneteller is committing adultery in his life. True. Interpretation of a dream about a woman seducing a man. Seeing one woman being rejected in court and her falling into adultery is evidence of her chastity, her readiness for her chastity, and her commitment to the matters of her religion. Seeing her engagement, and subsequent issues in a dream, is evidence of her firm desire to marry. And what includes relationships, must continue until an order is implemented that was effective. Regarding seeing a lover in a dream, there were disagreements between him and another woman, and his betrayal with her was a sign that she had lost her trust naively. It can be interpreted as good news for her that her wedding date with her wedding is approaching. Interpretation of seeing a woman seducing a married man in a dream. Seeing a woman hints to me about myself in a dream. If a man gets married and refuses to commit immorality, this is a sign that he will be tempted in reality, but he resists it. But if he obeys her command and continues what she wanted from her, this may be a sign that he has fallen into immorality and his thought contains the practice of such immorality in his real life. It is done It is also interpreted as a man betraying his wife or including her with the qualities that God has forbidden to her. Interpretation of seeing a delinquent in a dream Seeing a prostitute in a dream and inviting her to engage in indecent acts with her indicates the exploitation to which the dreamer is exposed and the exploitation of opportunities by those around him. Refusing to comply with women, a prostitute in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s adherence With his religion and his willingness to please his Lord. He always strives on the path of goodness, and the good reputation that the dreamer has in his society is the qualities and good morals that distinguish him. It is also evidence of his inability to make the right professional decisions. Seeing a prostitute inviting him to commit adultery, so it is a warning that he will come to divorce. Or separation from his wife. Concerning a free girl, if she sees a prostitute in her dream, she will be informed of the emergence of many problems and crises that will disturb her life. Interpretation of a dream about a man seducing me with myself. Some commentating experts said that this dream is a kind of liberation from emotional repression resulting from the separation of a man from his wife. Or the woman’s desire to get married. It is evidence of the weak faith of the dreamer, her lack of religion, and her distance from obedience to her Lord, so she repents and returns to her Lord. And look at the contentment, and the subsequent attack, and she was denying this attack, it tells the pregnant woman of the possibility of it occurring. Her falling into a calamity that she cannot bear. If she endures it, her honor and dignity are diminished, and the resulting humiliation and humiliation of her person is undermined. It is also a warning to her of her dire condition.

title: Interpretation of a dream about sesame

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sesame seeds in a dream is one of the visions, most of which express psychological comfort, and we will learn about some of the interpretations in the following lines. Following some of the most famous interpretation scholars, we will shed light on seeing sesame seeds in a dream for a man, woman, or single girl. You may also be interested in knowing about the primary school in A dream, but since our transparent website always confirms that these visions and their interpretations cannot be attributed to another vision, even if there is strong agreement with that vision, because the interpretation of a vision is a science and its interpretation does not depend only on what the dreamer saw, but there are many other factors. Which the interpreter must be familiar with in order to be able to interpret the vision.See sesame seedsThis vision shows the abundance of God’s good, plentiful and blessed provision, and God knows best.See sesame oil lama This vision is the appearance of something mysterious or hardship and exhaustion without a real result. Seeing yourself eating or cooking Sesame seedsIt indicates that the one who sees me is taking actions that will change the shape of his life for the better, and God knows best. I see that I get sesame seeds from anyone. It indicates that the dreamer will gain good luck in his life, to excel in his professional or scientific life. Seeing sesame picked by a beautiful girl soon The dreamer will marry a girl who is good in morals and religion by God’s command, and God knows best. A vision of taking sesame seeds from one person to give them to another person. Its importance comes from the integrity of this dreamer’s work and the satisfaction of the Almighty God and His acceptance of his actions. Interpretation of seeing sesame seeds in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sesame seeds in a dream is one of the visions that express There are many beautiful and good meanings that indicate the comfort and psychological security that the dreamer feels, and there are many scholars who say that sesame in a dream indicates the dreamer’s trade. It represents money and profit. There are some interpreters who believe that eating sesame in a dream is good news for the dreamer that he will get a lot of money and be happy in life. Seeing sesame seeds in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing sesame in a dream generally indicates an abundance of sustenance from Money that the dreamer will receive. Also, if the dreamer sees himself giving sesame seeds to an unknown woman, this indicates that the dreamer will excel in the work he is working on. As for a young man who dreams of taking a plate of sesame seeds from an unknown girl, this may be a sign of The young man is approaching marriage to one of the beautiful girls. Just as the young man sees himself in a dream giving sesame seeds to another person, this may be an indication that the young man is characterized by strong love between people and good morals. Seeing sesame seeds in a dream for a single woman may be the interpretation of seeing sesame in a dream. Good news for an unmarried girl is that she will soon marry a man famous for his high morals and piety. Also, if an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream eating sesame, this means that she will eat a lot, God willing, and will begin a new and happy life. title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing children in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing children in a dream represents many pleasant things that express optimism, both for women and men, in the next stage of their lives. Children in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing children in a dream? Children in a dream differ whether the dreamer sees a little boy or a beautiful little girl and whether He saw her crying, smiling, or playing and having fun in the place. Seeing the young child laughing and jumping here and there is a sign of the positive changes that await him soon. He will forget all the problems and difficulties he went through and consider it a memory from which he learned a lot and a lot. However, if the child cries without a sound, there are some disturbances that occur in the His life, but he quickly overcomes it and restores peace and tranquility in his life. A man may sometimes see in his dream that he has become a young child, and here some scholars said that he needs a lot of love and affection, especially if he is married, and finds neglect from her. He thinks a lot about how he really needs those feelings that he missed with his wife. But if his face turns into a child’s in the mirror of his room, he will be blessed with a baby boy who has many of the dreamer’s personality traits and he is very happy with him. Among the dreams that some believe are disturbing and have many connotations is that He kills a child in his sleep. Rather, scholars postponed this interpretation to Al-Khidr’s position with Moses, peace be upon him. . As the killing of the boy exceeded the limit of his knowledge and understanding. Whoever sees a girl expects a lot of goodness, whether it is money, marriage, or childbirth after a while. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing children in a dream? The Imam said: Whoever sees that he is carrying a small child on his shoulder, be prepared. For some new responsibilities that will be placed on him again. If the boy is a female, it is a good omen for the young man to marry a woman who appears in nature like that of a young girl in a dream. If his smile is bright, then marrying a girl with good morals will protect him and take care of his story, but if she is confused and constantly crying, then he lives in misery with his wife and does not find understanding with her. He said that whoever sees himself returning to the image of a young child may commit some mistakes that express About his immaturity and insignificance. As for whoever saw a group of children holding hands, these are the thoughts that accumulate in his head and bother him a lot these days. You still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Children in a dream for one person. If the girl is young and wants to acquire knowledge and sees herself carrying a beautiful child with a smile on her face, this means that the way is paved for her to obtain the degree she is looking for, especially if she loves science and is working towards For her without laziness. But if she is single and wants to start a family and marry the right person who will help her achieve her goal and ambitions in life, then seeing a boy is a sign of a delay in realizing her hope. The smile of children for an unmarried woman in her dream calls her to be optimistic about the future, which opens her arms to the fullest. Face. A little boy in his dream indicates many worries and problems that arise between family members or between them and a line

Seeing cutting can indicate Watermelon also indicates freedom from anxiety, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married man is seen cutting a cantaloupe, this means good thinking, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about buying watermelon in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying watermelon in a dream could be a sign of goodness, and God knows the unseen. In the case of seeing a married woman buying watermelon, this may lead to To satisfy desires, and God Almighty is above everything. If an unmarried girl is seen buying watermelon, this may indicate marriage, and God knows the unseen. The vision of buying watermelon can also represent profits, and God knows what is unseen. Interpretation of a dream about giving a dead watermelon in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about giving a dead person watermelon in a dream. Seeing the dead giving away may not mean good things. If a married woman sees a gift from the deceased, it may lead to loss. Seeing the dead giving away may also indicate failure, and God knows the unseen. In the case of seeing an unmarried girl giving to the dead, this may indicate the obstacles she faces in achieving her goals, and God Almighty And All-Knowing.Interpretation of a dream about eating fruit from the sky in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about eating fruit from the sky in a dream could be an indication of acquiring knowledge and knowledge, and God knows the unseen.If the dreamer sees himself eating fruit from the sky, this may indicate a source of knowledge and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Likewise, if the dreamer sees himself eating the food of the people of Paradise, this may indicate the money and inheritance that he will obtain, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a married woman sees clean strawberries, it can indicate goodness and well-being. Luck, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about buying guava in a dream. When the dreamer sees himself buying guava, he may express his satisfaction, and God knows best. If a married woman is seen buying guava, this may be a sign that she will be liberated. title: Stealing a car in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: We provide from gptafser.com/ all the interpretations related to seeing a stolen car in a dream for a single girl, divorced and pregnant women, married women, young men and men in detail. Interpretation of seeing a stolen car in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a stolen car in a dream for a single girl. It is a bad sign of failure in studies. If a single girl is looking for a job and dreams of stealing a car in a dream, it is an indication that he did not get the job he was looking for, and God knows best. As for the single girl who sees that her car was stolen, she finds in her dream a young man who restored it for her. This dream suggests that she will marry someone A man who is able to bear responsibility and seeks to make her happy all the time. As for the only girl who saw that her car was stolen in her dream, she was able to recover it after a while in the dream. This is an indication that the dreamer will face many difficulties in his life, but she will succeed in overcoming them, and God knows best. When A single girl dreams that she is driving a stolen car in a dream. This dream indicates that she is engaged to a young man with characteristics that she does not like and does not want to marry him, and God knows best. Seeing a stolen car in a dream for a single girl. It is a metaphor for fears and long thinking about the future, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation Ibn Sirin’s dream of a car: Interpretation of seeing a car stolen in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman, when she dreams of seeing a stolen car in front of her husband and he is silent, he did not do anything in the dream. It is a sign that in reality one is silent about some actions and has no reaction, and God knows best. The woman A married woman who sees that her husband is the one stealing the car in a dream. It is a bad vision for her husband to take advantage of his position at work and commit illegal acts such as bribery, and God knows best. Seeing a stolen car in a dream is for a pregnant woman in a dream. It is a sign of many fears in life, especially from the past in Under difficult circumstances, and God knows best. A married woman sees her car stolen in front of her house and her husband takes it from her in a dream. This dream indicates that her husband is a man in the true sense of the word, and she depends on him and feels safe with him, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman stealing a car in a dream is a sign of... The difficulty of life for the family, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a stolen car in a dream for a man and its meaning. When a man dreams of stealing a car in a dream. An indication of his thinking and fears in life from a financial standpoint, and God knows best. A man sees himself stealing a car in a dream. A sign that he is walking on an illegal path. With the intention of making money and profit, and God knows best. A man who witnesses the theft of a car, moves it, returns it to its owner, and receives its reward in a dream. It is a good vision because it shows that he is a good person and is making a lot of effort to earn a lawful livelihood. And when a man dreams of stealing his car and then recovering it again in a dream. This is an indication that he He is deceived by someone close to him, but this person fails by mismanaging the dreamer, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing a stolen car in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a car stolen in a pregnant woman’s dream. Be evidence of wrong things happening in her life and on her.

title: Interpretation of seeing parsley in a dream

preview.html:
Interpretation of seeing parsley: Among the visions that have been interpreted by scholars, seeing it is a vision of good and happy news, because all green crops bring goodness, livelihood, and money, and it differs from one person to another, and we will learn about most of the interpretations that came to this vision in today’s article, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing parsley in A dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees parsley in a dream, this is evidence of the abundance of food that will come to her in the coming days, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Ibn Sirin believes that an unmarried girl who sees parsley in a dream is waiting for a young man who will come forward to serve her, who will provide her with a decent life and save her. From all problems and worries and nothing will bring them. Parsley is a sign of abundance and abundance in everything. Interpretation of seeing parsley in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees parsley in a dream, this is good news from God Almighty that he will provide her with a lot of money in the coming days, and that there A huge improvement will happen to her.
ZOE. A married woman, if she saw parsley in her dream, the interpreters interpreted it as stability immediately and after problems and anxiety over her. The color of parsley varies in a married woman’s dream. If it is fresh and green, it is a sign of prosperity and contentment, but if it is yellow and not fresh, it is a sign of Stumbling in life. And some of the problems they encounter, and some translators mentioned that the matter may be a serious illness or pain, and in her life God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees crushed parsley, this is a sign of many fears and problems that she faces in life, but she can overcome all these obstacles. Interpretation of a man seeing parsley in a dream. If a man sees parsley in a dream, this is a sign that this person will soon be blessed by God Almighty with a job or job that he desires. Parsley is a sign of the prosperity of life, which is a vision of goodness, and God knows best. If a man sees himself in a dream buying parsley from The market, this is a sign of a big project that he will undertake that will make him a big profit and through it he can buy what he wants. As for the man who dreams that he is selling parsley, all scholars interpret that it is an unpleasant vision, and it may be a loss that the person will face, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If one sees that He plants parsley, as this is an indication that this person has good qualities and a degree of responsibility and commitment. Interpretation of parsley in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin explained that parsley in a dream is a sign of the good morals and high status of this person, but it differs from one person to another according to what is stated in the vision. Ibn Sirin believes that dried parsley in a dream is an indication of the problems and worries surrounding the dreamer, while fresh parsley is a sign of compensation from God Almighty and the emergence of worries and the release of worries after a long period. time. General. But if one sees parsley in a dream that is yellow and not fresh, then this is an indication that this person is not fully carrying out his duties. If a woman sees this dream, it is a sign of negligence and failure in performing her duties, and God is

If a woman sees this dream, it is a sign of negligence and failure to perform her duties, and God knows best.

title: The symbol of eggs in a divorced woman’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a single girlWhen an unmarried girl sees that she sees eggs in a dream. It indicates the changes that will occur in her life in the following period, giving her additional activity. Seeing a single woman preparing eggs in a dream. It symbolizes the high culture that she will gain from her future Because of her knowledge. And they are in high positions, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing eggs in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of the good that she will obtain and a new life that she will enter, God willing. Feeding eggs is a good sign that things will happen that will change her life for the better, God willing. Perhaps it is a vision Eggs are a beautiful sign of excellence and success in the academic field. It also indicates success in the private business that you undertake in projects that require intelligence. Seeing eggs for a Virgo girl indicates that she has a serious personality. She tends toward practical life and development and is a girl with many experiences. And seeing eggs inside the house is a sign that you are taking good care of your health. She keeps a lot of herself and this is a good thing, because health is a precious treasure. Buying eggs is a praiseworthy vision that carries good news for her that she will find the right man in her life, and God knows best. Broken eggs are also a sign of The girl’s marriage in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing eggs. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees that she is preparing eggs from food, her children eat that food. It indicates raising them in piety and that she will be a good, good mother. Seeing her husband in a dream preparing Eggs are for him. It indicates the happiness that fills their entire marital and family life. A lot of eggs in a dream, is an indication of good upcoming wealth for her husband. But to get them, it requires some effort and effort. Perhaps seeing eggs in a dream is good news because of her pregnancy, for God The highest and most knowledgeable. Seeing eggs in a dream for a married woman is a good sign of the existence of a strong relationship. Which is what she has with her husband because she enjoys a sense of marital stability. Buying eggs is evidence that this woman is really trying to preserve the life of her family and fulfill the required things and things. If she sees that her eggs It may break, as this does not deserve her praise. It indicates the emergence of marital disputes and problems that cause tension in the whole house. Seeing boiled eggs is a good dream for a married woman, which indicates her husband’s success in his field of work. Boiled eggs are also praised for married women, which It symbolizes a high status. As this husband comes from his work, his mother sees an increase in his livelihood. Collecting eggs in a dream for a married woman is good news for her about the abundant goodness that she will obtain. Also, eggs in a dream for a married woman are a good sign of her married life, which will become better with permission. God. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a man and its meaning. Preparing eggs in a dream for a man indicates goodness that will come to him in abundance, God willing. Many eggs for a man in a dream is a sign of...
